Making tibble have additional class of "census".
```{r}
class(tibble) <- c("census", class(tibble))
```

```{r}
summary.census <- function(tibble, num_vars = , cat_vars = ) {
  if (num_var ! PWGTP) {
    sample_mean <- sum(numeric_vector*weight_vector)/sum(weight_vector)
    sample_sd <- sqrt(sum(numeric_vectorˆ2*weight_vector)/sum(weight_vector)-sample_meanˆ2)} 
  if (cat_var) <- count
  
  
  return(list(result = tibble, sample_mean = mean, sample_sd = sd))
}
```

```{r}
summary(tibbble)
```
